nodes.long_description:
Has sido elegido. Prepárate para ser probado…

Bienvenido a Elysium, guerrero. ¿Estás listo para la gloria?

Completa las pruebas y extrae la esencia de las legiones deshonradas. Acumula combos con habilidad y precisión para conceder a tus enemigos una hermosa muerte—cuanto más hábil sea tu ejecución, más esencia recolectas.

Pero cuidado con los dragones…

La tormenta del guerrero Empuña la ballesta y el rayo en este juego de disparos basado en habilidades para conseguir combos brutales contra 8 tipos de enemigos únicos que pondrán a prueba tu valor y tu intelecto. La forma en que derrotes a tus enemigos es importante, cada enemigo presenta un nuevo desafío para probar tu sincronización y tu puntería.

Y poderosos jefes siempre estarán esperando para poner fin a tu viaje…

Pero contra probabilidades abrumadoras, los dioses están de tu lado! Con relámpagos abrasadores a tu disposición, tienes el poder de aniquilar a los deshonrados—pero mantén un ojo en tu medidor de carga! Gana tu gloria Con un tutorial completo y 3 configuraciones de dificultad para probar tu habilidad, compite contra tus amigos y compañeros guerreros de todo el mundo para demostrar tu valía y conquistar Elysium.

Pero solo los guerreros más valientes se convierten en campeones.

Desbloquea la dificultad de Campeón—el nivel más alto—para enfrentar los desafíos más agotadores que pueden ofrecer las Pruebas de Elysium. Con una tabla de clasificación completamente nueva, 4 nuevos tipos de enemigos (mucho más fuertes),
nodes.short_description:
Conquista Elysium

Lucha contra enemigos únicos y jefes mortales a través de mundos coloridos Cronometra tus golpes con las épicas bandas sonoras de metal y disfruta de la masacre Aprovecha los movimientos y debilidades de los enemigos para recolectar más esencia y ganar puntajes más altos Libera tu magia y el poder del rayo para destripar a las legiones Desbloquea una amplia gama de pieles de armas para personalizar tu equipo Reclama la victoria contra tus amigos en las tablas de clasificación

nodes.long_description:
選ばれた者よ、試される準備をせよ…

エリジウムへようこそ、戦士よ。栄光の準備はできているか？

試練をクリアし、不名誉な軍団からエッセンスを抽出せよ。技術と精度でコンボを積み重ね、敵に美しい死を与えよ—実行が巧妙であればあるほど、より多くのエッセンスを収集できる。

しかし、ドラゴンには注意せよ…

戦士の嵐 このスキルベースのシューティングゲームでクロスボウと雷を操り、8種類のユニークな敵に対して残忍なコンボを決めよ。敵をどのように倒すかが重要で、各敵がタイミングと照準を試す新たな挑戦を提供する。

そして強力なボスが常にあなたの旅の終わりを待ち構えている...

しかし、圧倒的な逆境にあっても、神々はあなたの側にいる! 灼熱の雷を駆使し、不名誉な者たちを消し去る力を持っている—しかし、チャージメーターに目を光らせよ! 栄光を手に入れよ 包括的なチュートリアルとスキルを試すための3つの難易度設定で、世界中の友人や戦士たちと競い合い、自分の価値を証明し、エリジウムを征服せよ。

しかし、最も勇敢な戦士だけがチャンピオンとなる。

最高難度のチャンピオンモードをアンロックして、エリジウムの試練が提供できる最も過酷な挑戦に挑め。全く新しいリーダーボード、4種類の新しい（より強力な）敵タイプ、より強力なボス、新しい雷魔法のチャージ方法を搭載。

そして、真の栄光のための最後の壮大なボスバトル...
nodes.short_description:
エリジウムを征服せよ

色とりどりの世界で、独自の敵や致命的なボスと戦え 壮大なメタルサウンドトラックに合わせて攻撃し、虐殺を楽しめ 敵の動きや弱点を利用して、より多くのエッセンスを集め、高得点を狙え 魔法と雷の力を解き放ち、軍団を切り裂け 装備をカスタマイズするための幅広い武器スキンをアンロックせよ 試練のリーダーボードで友達に勝利を収めろ そして、チャンピオン難易度に挑んで戦え…

nodes.long_description:
You have been chosen. Prepare to be tested…

Welcome to Elysium, warrior. Are you ready for glory? 

Complete the trials and extract the essence from the dishonored legions. Rack up combos with skill and precision to grant your enemies a beautiful death—the more skillful your execution, the more essence you collect. 

But beware of Dragons…

The warrior’s storm 
Wield crossbow and lightning in this skill-based shooter to score brutal combos against 8 unique enemy types that will test your mettle and your intellect. How you defeat your enemies matters with each foe presenting a new challenge to test your timing and your aim. 

And powerful bosses will always be waiting to end your journey… 

But against overwhelming odds, the gods are on your side! With scorching lighting at your disposal, you have the power to obliterate the dishonored—but keep one eye on your charge meter! 
Earn your glory
With a comprehensive tutorial and 3 difficulty settings to test your skill, compete against your friends and fellow warriors around the world to prove your worth and conquer Elysium.

But only the bravest warriors become Champions. 

Unlock Champion Difficulty—the highest tier—to take on the most grueling challenges Elysium Trials can offer. With an all-new leaderboard, 4 new (far stronger) enemy types, more powerful bosses, and new ways to charge your lightning magic.

And the final, epic boss battle for true glory…
nodes.short_description:
Conquer Elysium

Battle unique foes and deadly bosses across colorful worlds
Time your strikes to the killer epic metal soundtracks and revel in the slaughter
Exploit enemy move sets and weaknesses to collect more essence and earn higher scores 
Unleash your magic and the power of lightning to eviscerate the legions
Unlock a wide range of weapon skins to customize your loadout
Claim victory against your friends in the trial leaderboards
And fight your way to Champion Difficulty…

nodes.long_description:
Sei stato scelto. Preparati a essere messo alla prova…

Benvenuto a Elysium, guerriero. Sei pronto per la gloria?

Completa le prove ed estrai l'essenza dalle legioni disonorate. Accumula combo con abilità e precisione per concedere ai tuoi nemici una morte gloriosa—più abile è la tua esecuzione, più essenza raccogli.

Ma attenzione ai Draghi…

La tempesta del guerriero Brandisci balestra e fulmini in questo sparatutto basato sulle abilità per ottenere combo brutali contro 8 tipi di nemici unici che metteranno alla prova il tuo coraggio e il tuo intelletto. Come sconfiggi i tuoi nemici conta, ogni avversario presenta una nuova sfida per testare il tuo tempismo e la tua mira.

E potenti boss saranno sempre pronti a porre fine al tuo viaggio...

Ma contro probabilità schiaccianti, gli dei sono dalla tua parte! Con fulmini ardenti a tua disposizione, hai il potere di annientare i disonorati—ma tieni d'occhio il tuo indicatore di carica! Guadagna la tua gloria Con un tutorial completo e 3 livelli di difficoltà per mettere alla prova le tue abilità, competi contro i tuoi amici e compagni guerrieri di tutto il mondo per dimostrare il tuo valore e conquistare Elysium.

Ma solo i guerrieri più coraggiosi diventano Campioni.

Sblocca la Difficoltà Campione—il livello più alto—per affrontare le sfide più dure che le Prove di Elysium possono offrire. Con una nuova classifica, 4 nuovi (molto più forti) tipi di nemici, boss più potenti e nuovi modi per caricare la tua magia del fulmine.
nodes.short_description:
Conquista Elysium

Combatti nemici unici e boss mortali attraverso mondi colorati. Sincronizza i tuoi colpi con le colonne sonore epiche del metal e goditi il massacro. Sfrutta le mosse e le debolezze dei nemici per raccogliere più essenza e ottenere punteggi più alti. Scatena la tua magia e il potere del fulmine per eviscerare le legioni. Sblocca una vasta gamma di skin per armi per personalizzare il tuo equipaggiamento. Rivendica la vittoria contro i tuoi amici nelle classifiche delle prove.

nodes.long_description:
Du wurdest ausgewählt. Bereite dich auf die Prüfung vor…

Willkommen in Elysium, Krieger. Bist du bereit für Ruhm?

Schließe die Prüfungen ab und extrahiere die Essenz aus den entehrten Legionen. Sammle mit Geschick und Präzision Kombos, um deinen Feinden einen schönen Tod zu bereiten—je geschickter deine Ausführung, desto mehr Essenz sammelst du.

Aber hüte dich vor Drachen…

Der Sturm des Kriegers Führe Armbrust und Blitz in diesem skill-basierten Shooter, um brutale Kombos gegen 8 einzigartige Feindtypen zu erzielen, die deine Tapferkeit und deinen Intellekt testen werden. Wie du deine Feinde besiegst, ist wichtig, denn jeder Gegner stellt eine neue Herausforderung dar, um dein Timing und dein Zielen zu testen.

Und mächtige Bosse werden immer darauf warten, deine Reise zu beenden...

Doch gegen überwältigende Chancen sind die Götter auf deiner Seite! Mit sengendem Blitz zur Verfügung hast du die Macht, die Entehrten zu vernichten—aber behalte deine Ladestandsanzeige im Auge! Erreiche deinen Ruhm Mit einem umfassenden Tutorial und 3 Schwierigkeitsstufen, um deine Fähigkeiten zu testen, trittst du gegen deine Freunde und Mitkrieger aus der ganzen Welt an, um deinen Wert zu beweisen und Elysium zu erobern.

Doch nur die mutigsten Krieger werden zu Champions.

Schalte die Champion-Schwierigkeit frei—die höchste Stufe—um die härtesten Herausforderungen zu meistern, die die Elysium-Prüfungen bieten können. Mit einer völlig neuen Bestenliste, 4 neuen (viel stärkeren) Feindtypen.
nodes.short_description:
Erobere Elysium

Kämpfe gegen einzigartige Feinde und tödliche Bosse in bunten Welten. Timiere deine Schläge zu epischen Metal-Soundtracks und erfreue dich am Gemetzel. Nutze die Bewegungen und Schwächen deiner Feinde aus, um mehr Essenz zu sammeln und höhere Punktzahlen zu erreichen. Entfessle deine Magie und die Kraft des Blitzes, um die Legionen zu zerschmettern. Schalte eine Vielzahl von Waffenskins frei, um deine Ausrüstung anzupassen. Erringe den Sieg gegen deine Freunde in den Prüfungsran

nodes.long_description:
你已被选中。准备接受考验…

欢迎来到伊利西恩，战士。你准备好迎接荣耀了吗？

完成试炼，从被玷污的军团中提取精华。用技巧和精确度积累连击，为你的敌人带来美丽的死亡—你的执行技巧越高超，你收集的精华就越多。

但要小心龙…

战士的风暴 在这款基于技能的射击游戏中，挥舞弩和闪电，打出残酷的连击，对抗8种独特的敌人类型，它们将考验你的勇气和智慧。如何击败敌人很重要，每个敌人都提出一个新的挑战，以测试你的时机和瞄准。

强大的老板总是等待着结束你的旅程...

但面对压倒性的困难，神明站在你这边！拥有炽热的闪电，你有能力消灭被玷污的人—但要时刻注意你的充电仪表！ 赢得你的荣耀 通过全面的教程和3个难度设置来测试你的技能，与全世界的朋友和战士们竞争，证明你的价值并征服伊利西恩。

但只有最勇敢的战士才能成为冠军。

解锁冠军难度—最高等级—以迎接伊利西恩试炼所能提供的最严酷的挑战。拥有全新的排行榜、4种新的（更强大的）敌人类型、更强大的老板，以及新的闪电魔法充能方式。
nodes.short_description:
征服伊利西恩

在多彩的世界中，与独特的敌人和致命的首领战斗 在令人震撼的史诗级金属音轨中，恰到好处地打击，享受屠杀的快感 利用敌人的招式和弱点，收集更多精华并获得更高分数 释放你的魔法和闪电的力量，剖开军团 解锁各种武器皮肤，定制你的装备 在试炼排行榜上击败朋友，获得胜利 并努力挑战冠军难度...

nodes.long_description:
당신이 선택되었습니다. 테스트 준비를 하세요…

엘리시움에 오신 것을 환영합니다, 전사여. 영광을 맞이할 준비가 되셨나요?

시험을 완료하고 불명예스러운 군단에서 정수를 추출하십시오. 기술과 정밀도로 콤보를 쌓아 적에게 아름다운 죽음을 선사하세요—실행이 뛰어날수록 더 많은 정수를 모을 수 있습니다.

하지만 드래곤을 조심하세요…

전사의 폭풍 이 기술 기반 슈팅 게임에서 크로스보우와 번개를 사용하여 8가지 독특한 적 유형에 대해 잔인한 콤보를 기록하세요. 적을 물리치는 방식이 중요하며, 각 적이 타이밍과 조준을 시험할 새로운 도전을 제시합니다.

그리고 강력한 보스가 항상 당신의 여정을 끝내려고 기다리고 있습니다...

하지만 압도적인 역경에도 불구하고, 신들이 당신의 편에 있습니다! 사용 가능한 번개로 불명예스러운 자들을 소멸시킬 힘을 가지고 있지만, 충전 미터를 주시하세요! 영광을 얻으세요 포괄적인 튜토리얼과 기술을 테스트할 수 있는 3가지 난이도 설정을 통해 전 세계 친구 및 전사들과 경쟁하여 가치를 증명하고 엘리시움을 정복하십시오.

하지만 가장 용감한 전사만이 챔피언이 됩니다.

엘리시움 시험이 제공할 수 있는 가장 혹독한 도전을 맞이하기 위해 가장 높은 등급인 챔피언 난이도를 해제하세요. 전혀 새로운 리더보드, 4가지 새로운 (훨씬 강한) 적 유형, 더 강력한 보스 및 번개 마법을 충전하는 새로운 방법이 있습니다.

그리고 진정한 영광을 위한 최종, 서사시적인 보스 전투...
nodes.short_description:
엘리시움을 정복하라

다채로운 세계에서 독특한 적과 치명적인 보스와 싸워라 치명적인 에픽 메탈 사운드트랙에 맞춰 공격하고 학살을 즐겨라 적의 움직임과 약점을 이용하여 더 많은 정수를 모으고 높은 점수를 얻어라 마법과 번개의 힘을 해방시켜 군단을 해체하라 다양한 무기 스킨을 잠금 해제하여 장비를 맞춤 설정하라 시험 리더보드에서 친구를 이기고 승리를 쟁취하라 그리고 챔피언 난이도에 도전하여 싸워라...

nodes.long_description:
Vous avez été choisi. Préparez-vous à être testé…

Bienvenue à Elysium, guerrier. Êtes-vous prêt pour la gloire ?

Complétez les épreuves et extrayez l'essence des légions déshonorées. Accumulez des combos avec compétence et précision pour offrir à vos ennemis une belle mort—plus votre exécution est habile, plus vous collectez d'essence.

Mais méfiez-vous des Dragons…

La tempête du guerrier Maniez l'arbalète et la foudre dans ce jeu de tir basé sur les compétences pour marquer des combos brutaux contre 8 types d'ennemis uniques qui testeront votre courage et votre intellect. La manière dont vous vainquez vos ennemis compte, chaque adversaire présentant un nouveau défi pour tester votre timing et votre visée.

Et des boss puissants attendront toujours pour mettre fin à votre voyage...

Mais contre des chances écrasantes, les dieux sont de votre côté! Avec une foudre ardente à votre disposition, vous avez le pouvoir d'anéantir les déshonorés—mais gardez un œil sur votre jauge de charge! Gagnez votre gloire Avec un tutoriel complet et 3 niveaux de difficulté pour tester vos compétences, affrontez vos amis et vos camarades guerriers du monde entier pour prouver votre valeur et conquérir Elysium.

Mais seuls les guerriers les plus courageux deviennent des Champions.

Débloquez le niveau de difficulté Champion—le plus élevé—pour relever les défis les plus ardus que les Épreuves d'Elysium peuvent offrir. Avec un tout nouveau classement, 4 nouveaux types d'ennemis.
nodes.short_description:
Conquérir Elysium

Affrontez des ennemis uniques et des boss mortels à travers des mondes colorés. Synchronisez vos frappes avec les bandes sonores épiques de metal et réjouissez-vous du carnage. Exploitez les mouvements ennemis et leurs faiblesses pour collecter plus d'essence et obtenir de meilleurs scores. Déchaînez votre magie et le pouvoir de la foudre pour éviscérer les légions. Débloquez une large gamme de skins d'armes pour personnaliser votre équipement. Réclamez la victoire.

nodes.long_description:
You have been chosen, prepare to be tested! Complete the trials and extract the essence from the dishonored legions by giving them a beautiful death resulting from performing combos with speed and precision!

Oh...and uh....Beware of Dragons.

Game Features
A skill-based shooter - Execute specific combos on each unique enemy for example by doing a quick double tap 1 shot to the body then finish with a beautiful headshot on an archer or Exploit weaknesses with timing like snapping quickly to blast a heavily armored Dragon Knight right when it's mouth opens for bonus essence. Lastly, a difficulty setting for everyone to enjoy.

The Tested Warrior: YOU. Take on unique trials that take you to entirely different worlds while battling 8 unique enemies each with their own unique attacks. Each trial comes with its own epic fantasy rock/metal music that will leave you feeling like a warrior that has gone to....Elysium.  
  
  Rewarding Progression - Earn it! 
   - Racking up your score in each trial unlocks tons of new weapon models/skins getting more epic as you progress! 
   - Unlock a higher difficulty tier... Champion difficulty! Which has 4 more additional stronger unique enemies to deal with on top of new rules to how your lightning weapon charges. This tier has its own leaderboard bracket separate from the Warrior tier. 
   - Unlock the final trial for an epic battle that will remind you of some of video games' most epic boss encounters.
nodes.short_description: Skill-based Fantasy Shooter on rails with an Epic touch, how you defeat enemies matter! Shoot, unleash powerful lightning magic, and Dragons, beware of dragons as you battle through 8 unique enemies all with unique attacks in vastly different worlds with an epic fantasy rock/metal soundtrack.

nodes.change_log:
Update 1.2.0: Emberforge — January 22, 2026

Improvements
• The Forge has been redesigned to be more intuitive and player‑friendly.
• Progression for purchasing wands and crossbows with essences has been rebalanced for smoother early‑game and mid‑game flow.

Visual Upgrades
• All levels received updated lighting passes for stronger atmosphere and clarity.
• Fog has been added across most environments, enhancing depth, mood, and overall immersion.
• Various visual issues across environments were fixed, resulting in a cleaner and more cohesive look.

Performance
• General optimizations across scenes contribute to faster loading and smoother gameplay.

Update 1.1.1: Sharpshooter - March 8, 2025

Fixes:
-Translation fixes in the tutorial and Codex.

New Features
-Added a laser sight to weapons to improve aiming.
-Hit indicators now change color based on the number of hits remaining.

Update 1.1.1: Sharpshooter - March 8, 2025

Fixes:
* Translation fixes in the tutorial and Codex.

New Features
* Added a laser sight to weapons to improve aiming.
* Hit indicators now change color based on the number of hits remaining.

Update 1.1.0: Responsive Combat - March 3, 2025

Fixes:
-Fixed an issue where the Lefty Mode toggle was not functioning correctly. It should now work as intended for left-handed players.

New Features
-Added a new Weapon Rotation Adjustment setting, allowing players to customize the rotation of their weapons to better suit their preferences.

Gameplay Improvements
-Lightning Weapon Rework: Removed the charge-and-release mechanic for the lightning weapon. It now fires instantly when the shoot button is pressed. Making the weapon feel more responsive and intuitive to use.

Update 1.1.0: Let There Be Light! - October 17, 2024

Fixes:
* Addressed a bug causing players not to be centered in the game.

Improvements:
* Fixed various graphical issues.
* Added real-time lighting capability (Quest 3 only).
* Reworked lighting in the "Trial of Fortitude" level for enhanced visuals.
* Enhanced crossbow mechanics for a more immersive experience.
